channel.title: centos7 on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in centos7 on Vegetable Programing

item.title: etckeeper をインストール
item.description: インストール $ cd /usr/local/src $ git clone git://git.kitenet.net/etckeeper confのファイル末尾の箇所を修正 # The high-level package manager that's being used. # (apt, pacman-g2, yum etc) HIGHLEVEL_PACKAGE_MANAGER=yum # The low-level package manager that's being used. # (dpkg, rpm, pacman-g2, etc) LOWLEVEL_PACKAGE_MANAGER=rpm make $ make install ファーストコミッ
